issue.title: [Java] Support compare semantics for ArrowBufPointer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6156](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6156). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Compare two arrow buffer pointers by their content in lexicographic order.

null is smaller and shorter buffer is smaller.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6156?focusedCommentId=16907055) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5030
